T02D2388:20b-1: sth'a na m'a rga pha la ma h'a mu dra bh'a ba na n'a ma /
T02D2388:20b-3: gzhi lam 'bras bu bsgom pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nyams len zhes bya ba /
T02D2388:20b-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2388:20b-5: gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyi ni //
T02D2388:20b-6: rtsa gsum brgyud pa'i bla ma dang //
T02D2388:20b-7: yig 'bru gsum gyi nyams len ni //
T02D2388:20b-8: nyam chung nyon cig bshad par bya //
T02D2388:20b-9: lte ba sbrul pa'i 'khor lo nas //
T02D2388:20b-10: sna bu ka gnyis dang tshangs pa'i bar //
T02D2388:20b-11: rtsa gsum la ni sems gtad bya //
T02D2388:20b-12: g-yon gyi dkar dang g-yas rtsa dmar //
T02D2388:20b-13: dbus kyi mi bskyod mthing ga la //
T02D2388:20b-14: g-yas par h'um dang g-yon par aom //
T02D2388:20b-15: tshangs pa'i bu gar aa yig bsam //
T02D2388:20b-16: 'od gsal mthing ga dkar dang dmar //
T02D2388:20b-17: khams gsum sbrul ba'i 'od kyis khyab //
T02D2388:20b-18: gdul bya btul nas slar yang thim //
T02D2388:20b-19: yi ge gsum gyi zla tshes la //
T02D2388:20b-20: stong pa'i thig le steng du ni //
T02D2388:20b-21: brgyud pa'i bla ma 'od gsal ni //
T02D2388:20b-22: de steng 'di ltar bsgom par bya //
T02D2388:20b-23: g-yon gyi sna bug yi ge la //
T02D2388:20b-24: yid ches nyams myong bla ma ni //
T02D2388:21a-2: 'bras bu mngon sum bla ma ste //
T02D2388:21a-3: h'um yig zla tshes steng du ste //
T02D2388:21a-4: brtan par bsam gtan bsgom par bya //
T02D2388:21a-5: rlung gsum 'gags te gdon gsum sel //
T02D2388:21a-6: dug gsum rnam rtog bral 'gyur ba //
T02D2388:21a-7: rgyu 'bras chos kyi rtog pa spangs//
T02D2388:21a-8: lus kyi dgon pa brtan 'gyur bas //
T02D2388:21a-9: bdag gzhan gnyis med don rtogs te //
T02D2388:21a-10: dur khrod kyi ni 'jigs pa spangs //
T02D2388:21a-11: ha ri tsandra nam mkha'i dbyings //
T02D2388:21a-12: dri za'i grong khyer longs spyod byed //
T02D2388:21a-13: gzhi lam 'bras bu bla ma bsgom pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2388:21a-14: chen po'i nyams lan zhes bya ba slob dpon pam
